description: This file contains CSS styles for a web application, including theme management variables and styles for various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application style that sets text alignment, background color, and handles responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, hover, and active states.
